page.title: 05INDUSTRY
page.content: There are an abundance of industries in this block but the most important is the metal manufacturing industry. Many types of products are made from nuts and bolts to steel pipes and from garden swings to abbatoir fittings. The Cradley Heath area is particularly famous for chainmaking, dating back many years. The anchor chain for the "Titanic" was made with each link weighing about five hundredweight. Most of these factories obtain their raw materials from within The Black Country for speed and economic reasons. The finished products are distributed throughout the UK as well as all over the world. The area has been severely hit by the closure of firms and consequent unemployment including Round Oak Steel Works which employed over two thousand workers.
